basic_information.scholarship_name: Tinker Federal Credit Union Design Scholarship
basic_information.college_name: College of Fine Arts and Design

description: This scholarship was established in 2007 to provide scholarship assistance to students within the UCO Department of Design. Eligibility Design major Sophomore, junior, senior, or graduate student Major GPA 3.25+ and cumulative GPA 3.0+ Enrolled full time (12+ hours undergraduate, 9+ hours graduate) Demonstrate financial need Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Fine Arts and Design   or SIS_College_2 is Fine Arts and Design
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Fine Arts and Design   or SIS_College_2 is Fine Arts and Design

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
